price: 91. Alle ma yeelan wiil (ilmo), mana aha la jirkiis ilaah (kale) - markaas wuxuu la tagi lahaa ilaah walba wuxuu abuuray, oo qaarkood waxay ka adkaan lahaayeen qaar kale. Ka hufan Allaah (ceeb iyo nuqsaan oo dhan) waana ka Sarreeyaa waxyaalaha ay ku tilmaamayaan.
arabic: مَا ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ مِن وَلَدٖ وَمَا كَانَ مَعَهُۥ مِنۡ إِلَٰهٍۚ إِذٗا لَّذَهَبَ كُلُّ إِلَٰهِۭ بِمَا خَلَقَ وَلَعَلَا بَعۡضُهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٖۚ سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: mā ittakhadha al-lahu min waladin wamā kāna maʿahu min ilāhin idhan ladhahaba kullu ilāhin bimā khalaqa walaʿalā baʿḍuhum ʿalā baʿḍin sub'ḥāna al-lahi ʿammā yaṣifūna
